about_the_game:
About the Game

Lami: A Cup of Code & Coffee is a 3D casual game that blends Japanese aesthetics with café management, card-based strategy, and rhythm gameplay. The story follows a young protagonist who, feeling disenchanted with their mundane life, receives a letter from their late grandfather asking them to take over his café. Intrigued, the protagonist quits their job and heads to the café, only to discover a hidden research lab on the upper floor, where an AI robot girl named Lami awakens. It turns out that Lami was developed by the protagonist’s grandfather, and now, together with Lami, they embark on a new life managing the café. What challenges await them?

Key Features

  • Café Management Fun
    Manage your café through a turn-based card game. Collect and combine different types of cards to create the perfect coffee blends for your customers. Lami will be by your side, helping you run the café smoothly.
  • Customize and Redecorate
    Renovate and decorate your grandfather's café to create a unique atmosphere that reflects your style. Certain decorations can even influence your deck, adding strategic depth to your gameplay.
  • Upgrade Lami’s Abilities (Rhythm Game)
    Utilize the protagonist’s engineering skills to inherit and build upon your grandfather’s research, upgrading Lami’s capabilities. Take on rhythm-based challenges to enhance Lami’s functions, making her an even more effective assistant in your café management.

Ready to Take on the Challenge?

In Lami: A Cup of Code & Coffee, you’ll face the challenges of café management, technological upgrades, and uncovering the mysteries left behind by your grandfather. There’s more to this café than meets the eye, and it’s up to you and Lami to discover its secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3.5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3.5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
